Information Technology   /   Program Services   /               Sub Navigation                                 Business Change Management                       Service Delivery Redesign                       Business Process Improvement                       Project Management                       Toolkit                                                                   Project Management       The PSO’s Project Managers, in partnership with ITS (Information Technology Services) and GTS (Global Technology Services), develop and utilize standard project lifecycle processes, approaches and templates to implement new administrative systems and upgrades. Specifically, the PSO can assist with:          Developing business cases and project charters for new projects   Managing the overall issue escalation and project status reporting   Developing business requirements and functional specifications   Selecting software package solutions   Coordinating testing (user acceptance, regression and quality assurance testing)   Overseeing training and functional deployment to customers   Ensuring an appropriate ongoing support model is in place   Monitoring administrative systems and services project budgets     Visit the PSO Toolkit to learn more about the key tools and templates used for Project Management, Business Change Management and Business Process Improvement.                Project Management Overview        Project management organizes key components of a project, clearly identifying goals and objectives, and monitoring the overall progress against various constraints - surrounding scope, resources, timing and funding. Project Managers will typically utilize a standard project lifecycle, adopting best practices partnered with a set of tools and templates. Read more about the project life cycle .     The PSO Lifecycle aligns with the ITS and GTS Project Methodologies. Click here to read more about the ITS Project Management Methodology .                                        Associated Templates          Project Initiation Document  Budget Worksheet  Business Requirements Document  User Acceptance Testing Plan/Schedule (UAT)  Deployment Plan  Project Close Out Checklist  Business Case/Project Scorecard  Project Charter  Functional Specification Document  Use Case Tracker  Launch Support Plan  Project Close Out Document    Vendor Scorecard  Requirements Traceability Matrix   Support Model  Project Close Out Presentation    Workplan  Risk and Issue Log   Job Aid/FAQs     Project Status Report         Change Readiness Assessment         Stakeholder Analysis         Communications Plan         Governance Structure         Current and Future State Process Flows                                                                           PSO Toolkit Resources & Templates                                                                                         Initiate a Project with PSO                                                                            NYU Footer          Search      Directory      Campus Map      Events      Contact Us      Site Map      Copyright and Fair Use      Feedback         Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. All rights reserved. Designed by The Office of Web Communications
